scripts.buildall: cmake-js configure --debug -- -DRUN_WRAPPERGEN=run && cmake-js configure --debug -- -DRUN_WRAPPERGEN=qwe && cmake-js build --debug && tsc --build
scripts.releasebuild: cmake-js configure -- -DRUN_WRAPPERGEN=run && cmake-js configure -- -DRUN_WRAPPERGEN=qwe && cmake-js build && tsc --build
scripts.crossbuild: cmake-js configure --arch arm --CDCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=$CROSS_BUILD_TOOLCHAIN_FILE --CDEXTRA_INCLUDES=$CROSS_BUILD_EXTRA_INCLUDES --CDRUN_WRAPPERGEN=qwe && cmake-js compile --arch arm --CDCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=$CROSS_BUILD_TOOLCHAIN_FILE --CDEXTRA_INCLUDES=$CROSS_BUILD_EXTRA_INCLUDES && tsc --build
